official_title: Assessing the Impact of Dosage Frequency of Propranolol on Sleep Patterns in Patients With Infantile Hemangiomas
inclusion_criteria:
* clinically diagnosed hemangiomas.
* English or Spanish speaking only
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have maximum age of 18 Months
exclusion_criteria:
* Parents who do not consent to the study.
* Significant cardiac or pulmonary disease who are unable to tolerate oral propranolol
